title: Broken, Brought & Betrayed
description: They say you can’t pick your family or your parents . This is true for Camilla Blackbourn, after her mother dies she’s is sold by her father to please his new wife as well as to strike back at Camilla’s mother. But with every tragedy comes a blessing. Just when she thinks she's hit rock bottom her prayers are answered. Watch as the twists and unpredictable turns take your mind on a ride of mystery and suspense.
author: R. Coxton
